name: places/ChIJeaa_wmr2wokR2QMm_ZKXsAI
formattedAddress: 1302 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1302 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10027-4244, USA

originalText.text:
In the beginning Dr. Correa was very courteous and sweet, took the time to listen to what I had to say.  He had to in order to verify my illnesses.  He usually had his assistance deal with me after the initial 1st visit.  They were nice but lacked the capacity to actually listen.  There is a receptionist Emily is rude and very dismissive.  Someone called me in the receptionist area when I got there Emily said: "What do you want?" and rolled her eyes.  I looked at her and asked if I did something for her to speak to me in that tone?  She didn't answer, the other person said, I called her because those papers are hers.  She looked at the other girl and said "Oh", then tossed the papers to me.  She should be fired, she's extremely rude and needs a lesson in manners.

I keep going to see Dr. Correa because it is convenient for me but if they keep being rude and inconsiderate I will seriously consider finding another doctor.  The wait time is to long, the whole purpose of making an appointment is so you can be seen by the doctor (not his assistant) at that schedule time.  Why make an appointment if they're going to keep you waiting!!!

originalText.text:
Dr. Correa has been my primary care physician for many years.
He also cares for my parents.   He has helped me so much with everything I have been through.  He is efficient, respectful, has a great personality, and he is down to earth.  I like being able to have a doctor who is always willing to listen and give me input on how to improve my overall health.  I have recommended Dr. Correa to friends and family and everyone has been satisfied with his services.

originalText.text: I like my doctor but this office has no respect for people's time. I have been waiting for 2 hours for a scheduled appointment. I am not even in the exam room. this is my 4th visit here and each time takes 4 hours! INSANE.  I'm now in a waiting room which is not spaced out 6 feet apart.  so now I've been basically exposing myself to covid unnecessarily because this practice doesn't care about it's patients. it seems like all they want to do is pack as many patients in as they can. I do NOT recommend and I will not be coming back. you can see in the photo there is no way these chairs are 6 feet apart.  this is straight up nonsense.i do not feel safe at this office.  #FAIL

originalText.text: My first visit at Dr. Correa’s office was great! All of my concerns/needs were appropriately addressed. The staff was exceptional and I admire their team dynamic. Everyone worked together all the while being professional and effective. I 100% recommend this place for high-quality primary care.

text.text: My first visit at Dr. Correa’s office was great! All of my concerns/needs were appropriately addressed. The staff was exceptional and I admire their team dynamic. Everyone worked together all the while being professional and effective. I 100% recommend this place for high-quality primary care.

originalText.text: I extremely love Dr. Michael Correa! The best  Care Provider in the world. He allows his patient's to speak about what is going on and you actually feel like you are very much included in your healing process. He explains everything thoroughly. I went to him feeling half dead in 2014 and he revised a plan of care to help me get back to my full self. I feel like he is more family than my Care Provider. He is completely awesome !
